Producer: Sebastian Schipper, Jan Dressler, Anatol Nitschke, Catherine Baikousis, David Keitsch
Screenwriter: Sebastian Schipper, Olivia Neergaard-Holm, Eike Frederik Schulz
Synopsis: Four local Berliners recruit a thrill-seeking Spanish woman (Laia Costa) to be their getaway driver for a bank robbery.
Title: Victoria
